title: Deploying to Heroku
summary: This guide explains the process of deploying a Quarkus web application to Heroku using different methods including using a Quarkus Maven build, pushing container images with Docker or Podman, and deploying as a native Quarkus application. It covers setting the HTTP port for Heroku, managing application properties, and integrating with CI/CD pipelines. Both Java and native compilation are discussed, with specific commands and configurations for Docker and Podman, including troubleshooting tips for common issues.
